channel.title: Give me some help deciding
channel.description:
Alright so, I've made my "packs" for quite a bit now, making them has been quite enjoyable, but now that I think about it and making a 9.0, I believe it's quite pathetic really, "He can't make a server so he has to make this", that's what people will say, "He can't code he has to make that shit" or "He's a huge ass leecher", I've also reflected myself from those comments.
I'd like judgement for all of those who downloaded, support me when I released these things. So basically Just post Should I stop making them? Should I continue? [center] [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/2nu84kk.jpg[/img] http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,413063.0.html - Version 9.0 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,403829.0.html - Version 8.0 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,392508.0.html - Version 7.0 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,385149.0.html - Version 6.0 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342790.0.html - Version 5.0 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,337015.0.html - Version 4.0 http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,332691.0.html - Version 3.0 2.0 and 1.0 have been deleted.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,384830.0.html - Lite 1.0

item.title: Give me some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Newty:

This just looks like an attempt at advertising to me.

I doubt it; he came on IRC awhile ago with the same questions.

@Z 0 D I A C: It seems alot of people appreciate your packs; moreso than you do. May I suggest that you create a private project for yourself, while continuing with the packs for others (Should you feel so inclined) ?

Read full topic

item.title: Give me some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

This just looks like an attempt at advertising to me.

Read full topic

item.title: Give me some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

Like DavidScape was lol.

Six versions all in one thread. (Had links for each version, in case someone didn’t want certain features)

Read full topic

item.title: Give me some help deciding
item.dc:creator: @TabbyKiller TabbyKiller
item.description:
@TabbyKiller wrote:

Well. Just make one topic and update the topic each time a new programme/helper comes out when you feel like it.

e.g.
July 1st Title= Z 0 D I A C’s server package. Includes: modeller, positioner blah blah blah
Augest 1st Title= Z 0 D I A C server package v1. Includes: modeller, positioner,hypercam blah blah blah
September 1st Title = Z 0 D I A C server package v2. Includes: modeller, positioner, hypercam,auto talker,auto responder blah blah blah

Do you get the pattern?
Release one topic and update it each month or so

Read full topic

Alright so, I’ve made my “packs” for quite a bit now, making them has been quite enjoyable, but now that I think about it and making a 9.0, I believe it’s quite pathetic really, “He can’t make a server so he has to make this”, that’s what people will say, “He can’t code he has to make that shit” or “He’s a huge ass leecher”, I’ve also reflected myself from those comments.
